pages.title: Ender Tarot Card
pages.text: $(o)   Gather pearls from above,$(br)   grind up dust from below$(br2)   Hold firmly in one hand$(br)   a single Eye of the End $(br2)    Combine now any card,$(br)     mind as it is spun$(br2)     A mystery before you,$(br)    now the All is in One!

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: Combine an Eye of Ender with any Tarot card to transform it.$(br2)  When placed, an Ender Tarot Card will be face down, and it will mysteriously turn into a new random card everytime you flip it.
